column1: According to the Momosame sisters,
it should be around here.
Are you looking for me?
Miss witch?
So you finally show up.
The girl who's been crossing the Border.
Are you referring to the barrier that separates between the Outside World and Gensokyo?
If that is so, that barrier is useless against me.
What? Just how did you do it?
You don’t know?
Your so-called border actually gives out a warm feeling of existence just like the other world.
Since I belong to both Outside World and Fantasy World,
passing through a barrier like that is nothing to me.
So that’s how it is.
How nice! I'd love to visit the other world myself!
Oh?
Are you trying to leave Gensokyo?
No! That's not what I meant!
I just want to take a look,
just to see how the Outside World is like.
I’m sure life in Gensokyo's much better anyway.
Do you really think so?
Well, how about this? If you win, maybe I'll take you to visit the Outside World.
You're obviously lying.
But still, I'm very interested in Outsiders like you,¡
so let’s have a danmaku duel!
Gensokyo's magician?
I'm curious of what sort of power you possess, too.
Well then, I will use only a quarter of my strength,
and drown you with this moonlight danmaku!
